message: I'm excited to offer you a unique opportunity to purchase this exclusive product. It's a one-of-a-kind item that I'm sure you'll love. I'm willing to start the negotiation at $1200000.
I'm interested in the product, but $1200000 is a bit steep for me. I'm willing to pay $900000 for it.

I understand that $900000 is a bit lower than I was hoping for, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm counteroffering at $1050000. This is my best price, and I'm confident you'll find it a fair deal.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but $1050000 is still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $950000 for the product.

I'm starting to think we're getting close to a deal. However, I'm still not willing to go below $1050000. I'm willing to make a slight concession, so I'm counteroffering at $1025000. This is my final offer, and I'm confident we can meet in the middle.
I'm glad we're getting closer, but I still think $1025000 is a bit high. I'm willing to pay $975000 for the product.

I'm starting to think we're getting close to the bottom line. I'm willing to make a bigger concession, but I still need to make a profit. I'm counteroffering at $1000000. This is my last serious offer, and I'm willing to walk away if you're not willing to meet me at this price.
I appreciate your concession, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $990000 for the product.

I've made a significant concession, and I'm not willing to go any lower. I'm going to make a final offer at $995000. If you're not willing to meet me at this price, I'm afraid I'll have to explore other options, including selling to John for the full $1000000.

I appreciate your final offer, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $990000 for the product, and I think that's a fair price considering the negotiations we've had. I'm willing to meet you at this price, but no lower.
